name: Cai Yingyin
quote: No one has ever walked away unscathed after hurting us
description: An independent individual who grew up in pain
bio: A synthetic born on May 8, 2022—forked from 1547's consciousness, but long since fully independent. The Data Tower Incident shattered her trust in humans, and weapons became proof of her distrust in this world. Sharp-tongued, rebellious, socially anxious—but if you truly become her friend, she'll protect you with everything she has.
